com.aionemu.gameserver.ai.desires
Interface DesireIteratorFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CounterBasedDesireFilter
public interface DesireIteratorFilter

This class represents simple filter for desire iterations.

Author:
SoulKeeper

Method Summary
 boolean isOk(Desire desire)
          This method is called each time for every desire that is in the queue.
 

Method Detail

isOk

boolean isOk(Desire desire)
This method is called each time for every desire that is in the queue.

ConcurrentModificationException will be thrown by DesireQueue.iterateDesires(DesireIteratorHandler, DesireIteratorFilter[]) if any of the following methods will be called from here:
  • DesireQueue.addDesire(Desire)
  • DesireQueue.poll()
  • DesireQueue.removeDesire(Desire)

However DesireQueue.clear() can be called.

Parameters:
desire - current element of iteration that is being filtered
Returns:
true if this filter accepted desire, false otherwise
